entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow or periods of ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
